description:
■Contents
・4 Additional Military Units
Wolf/Bear/Tiger/Panda

・3 Additional Campaign Scenarios
Battle of Tong Gate / The Fall of Shu / Popularity Contest

・6 Gems
Solar Gem / Moon Gem / Lei Gong Gem / Fengbo Gem / Kuafu Gem / Blight Gem

・10 Custom Ancient Officers
Xiang Ji / Liu Bang / Han Xin / Zhang Liang / Xiao He / Yu Meiren / Ying Zheng / Wang Jian / Yue Yi / Wei Wuji

■To Use
Additional Military Units: In Conquest Mode, choose Political Commands - Info - Player Info - Military Unit Settings.
Additional Campaign Scenario: Choose from Conquest Mode - New Game - Select Scenario.
Gems: In Conquest Mode, choose from Political Commands - Info - Player Info - Equipment.
Custom Ancient Officers: Choose from Conquest Mode - New Game - Select Scenario- Select Officer.
name: Additional Military Unit/Scenario/Gems/Ancient Officers Set
